Producer: Galley Alexander Molina, Michael K. Race, Sean Dinwoodie, Steve Race
Rating: PG (Some Suggestive Content|Brief Language|A Scene of Violence|Thematic Elements)
Synopsis: The past of a former drug dealer (Jeff "Ja Rule" Atkins) proves problematic as his love for a devout woman (Adrienne Bailon) grows.
Title: I'm in Love With a Church Girl
